## Introduction

THE SUBCLUSTERING DOES NOT WORK BECAUSE THERE SIMPLY ARE NOT ENOUGH CELLS

```{r}
library(Seurat)

library(circlize)

library(here)

source(here("plot_theme.R"))

```

```{r}
# load the annotated seurat object 
CphRNAi <- readRDS(here("output", "CphRNAi_seurat_integrated_annotated.rds"))

# select EE cells
DefaultAssay(CphRNAi) <- "RNA"
EE_CphRNAi <- DietSeurat(CphRNAi, assays = "RNA")[,CphRNAi$celltype_manual=="EE"]
```
